channel.title: [Delta][req] Caskets [req][Delta]
channel.description:
Hey i was wondering if someone could help me with this i want to make item caskets when you open them it gives stuff but i have no idea how to make it i do know the item ids for example
Item ids [code]Casket - 2714 Saradomin full helm - 2665 Saradomin platebody - 2661 Saradomin plate legs - 2663 Saradomin kiteshield - 2667[/code]
thanks for now and i'll rep++
